reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: This an attractive modern hotel right on the shore of Lake Geneva. We had a great room with a balcony with fantastic views. My only gripes are with the slightly less than perfect service. For example, check in was a slow and the internet didn't work for us which the hotel failed to fix. However Maxime was fantastic helping us above and beyond the call of duty with getting our hire car.
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: I recently stayed at Hilton Evian for 2 nights. The location of the hotel is great, just across the road from Ferry terminal, overlooking the lake. 5 minute walk to the Rue Nationale where many shops and restaurants are.
reviews.title: Excellent!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled solo
reviews.text: Our twin room on level 5 was spacious, quiet and clean. The room faced the street. Bathroom was also spacious and clean, with usual Hilton standard toiletries provided. Tea/coffee facility in the room was handy.
reviews.title: The views are amazing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Water is quite expensive in that area. A bottle of water costs €8 at Hilton and €3.50-€6 in shops. Mineral water springs where locals fill the bottles for free were useful. There are a couple, on the street parallel to Rue Nationale, behind Evian Masters. Water tasted good.
reviews.title: A very professionally-managed hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: Check in and out was easy. Reception staff were very friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: An oasis of calm and luxury on Lake Geneva...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We loved this hotel. Large, comfortable, pleasant room, very quiet, the hotel staff was friendly staff, excellent lounge. The breakfast selection was very good. We didn't have dinner in the hotel restaurant, so can't comment on that. The gym and spa are amazing--multiple pools, good group exercise classes. The view of the lake from the top floor lounge balcony is lovely. Take the boat across to Switzerland, or drive around the lake. Wonderful hiking in the area. It's also an easy drive into Geneva. Very highly recommended.
reviews.title: Fantastic--a wonderful experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I recently stayed with my husband at the Hilton and enjoyed our time there very much - the staff were welcoming and helpful. However the food in the Riva resturant ( attached to the hotel at its base) was AWEFUL- overpriced and over ambitious. if you can't even get a Ceasar Salad right then you can't really cook !
reviews.title: Very good - save for the food

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: Having said that the rest of the hotel couldn't have been more helpful and kind - recomend the Budda Spa as well!! Just don't eat in the Riva Resturant.
reviews.title: My favorite Hilton

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is the second time we've stayed at this Hilton and it didn't disappoint. We used award points and reserved two rooms. We were upgraded to the Executive floor and had full use of the Executive lounge which was open from 7am to 11 pm. The rooms were a decent size and had full views of Lake Geneva.
reviews.title: Hard to imagine better in the area...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We drove in from Geneva and the hotel is very easy to find. Parking is underneath the hotel. We ate in the restaurant one night amd in the Cosmopolitan bar another night. The food and service were very good.
reviews.title: Superb hotel, excellent facilities and staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel itself is beautiful, our room was spacious, had a wee lake view and everything was wonderful!!!! The restaurant has a pleasant outside area, and breakfast was very good providing there are no tour groups from japan. When we were there they just cleaned out the breakfast food, sat on all the tables and had NO regard for other guests. Apart from this a very pleasent stay.
reviews.title: A lovely Hotel setting

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked a pre-paid room directly through the Hilton website for a quick stopover in Evian. Opted for the upgrade to a deluxe room. Well worth it to have a nice view of the lake. We were quite satisfied with our room which was modern and airy (aside from a stuffy smell of cigarettes, apparently from a previous guest). It was late in the afternoon, but we decided to slip down to the outdoor pool for a quick swim...donned the bathrobes and slippers and went down to the spa level... only to be informed that access to the pool was reserved for paying guests of the spa, and would require an additional EUR 13 per person per day. We were outraged that the hotel, which advertised an outdoor pool, had not informed us of the policy, which apparently only changed as of June 1st. Although the hotel is lovely, it left a bitter taste in our mouths to have to pay for access to a basic facility like a swimming pool in a hotel of this caliber. We contacted the management who were unapologetic and completely intransigent. Quel dommage!
reviews.title: Disappointing to have to pay extra for the pool

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011
reviews.text: Wonderful hotel it is one of the best hotels in the world
reviews.title: Truely wonderful

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel itself is beautiful, our room was spacious, had a great lake view and everything was wonderful!!!! The restaurant has a pleasant outside area, and breakfast was delicious and full of options.
reviews.title: Wonderful Experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great Spa, great pool, great pool bar.
reviews.title: Loved it!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A great place to stay for visiting Lake Geneva and surronding Alps also we had a great day out to Chamonix to view the alps and Mont Blanc
reviews.title: Fantastic Hotel & Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled solo
reviews.text: The Hilton has nice comfortable room, good tv choise, bed are goods, the shower cabin is a bit cheap. Breakfast choise is average, service ok. Spa is really nice.
reviews.title: Very Nice Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Good place to relax for a weekend.
reviews.title: Awesome surprise

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: We stayed there overnight to go to ski area. We decided to stay in Evian-Les-Bain instead of Geneva because of huge hotel rates diference. Since we were driving distance was not a issue.
reviews.title: Not family Friendly - are you kidding me?

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled on business
reviews.text: One word defines my experience, excellent. From the rooms to checkout, passing through breakfast and staff everything was perfect. The only negative note was I stayed for 1 night, and didn´t have the time to enjoy the spa neither the city. We will be back for sure.
reviews.title: Faultless...apart from no free wi-fi
